description: A security researcher managed to pull a list of Ghost users, resellers, and even customer support messages from an exposed server. It shows how as organized criminals move to making their own encrypted platforms, they might make vulnerable products.
title: Ghost, Encrypted Phone for Criminals, Was an ‘Absolute Mess’

description: AI-generated images of mushrooms that look nothing like the real species could spread misleading and dangerous information.
title: Google Serving AI-Generated Images of Mushrooms Could Have 'Devastating Consequences'
